name: Al Quran
info: The Prophet says: Wealth is appropriate to a God-fearing person, but good health is better for the God-fearing than wealth. He further says: He of you who finds himself enjoying good health, secure in his community and has his daily sustenance, is as if he had the whole world at his finger tips

name: Bukhari Sharif

He further says: He of you who finds himself enjoying good health, secure in his community and has his daily sustenance, is as if he had the whole world at his finger tips
